Articles.Content:
Is ground effect in the game? when i say that if you know about planes and phiscs u'll know what i mean.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T17:14:58Z" title="05/03/2015 05:14  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by Jaffa Cookie**

Nope, it's not. However, wings provide more lift when you're going slower\* (in relative terms) so stall speeds are quite low.

\*this is so that both gliders and spaceplanes "feel right" in their respective regimes.
